empty_vat_button.componentleveltooltip: Claim Growth Vat monsters||Empty the Growth Vat to claim instantly recruitable units. Each claimed batch also grants different amounts of [[img:icon_mutagen]][[/img]]Mutagen in addition to [[img:icon_skaven_food]][[/img]]10 food which can be increased to [[img:icon_skaven_food]][[/img]]15 by upgrading the Flesh Laboratory.
